text: @realDonaldTrump U are in denial- the covid-19 is worse than ever & the worst in the world. WE NEED MORE TESTING & follow up to see where we really stand! U are more stupid than anyone could have forseen! Real leaders get the facts and act on the facts!! U are using your erring gut - fool!
